T02adhsatpu:0: Adhyardhaśatikā Prajñāpāramitā namo namaḥ sarvabuddhabodhisattvebhyaḥ || namo bhagavatyā āryaprajñāpāramitāyai ||
T02adhsatpu:1: AśP 1. evam mayā śrutam ekasmin samaye bhagavān
T02adhsatpu:2: sarvatathāgatavajrādhiṣṭhānasamayajñānavividhaviśeṣasamanvāgataḥ sarvatathāgataratnamukuṭatraidhātukābhiṣekaprāptaḥ sarvatathāgatasarvajñajñānamahāyogeśvaraḥ sarvatathāgatasarvamudrāsamatādhigato viśvakāryakaraṇatayāśeṣānavaśeṣasattvadhātusarvāśāparipūrisarvakarmakṛn mahāvairocanaḥ śāśvatas tryadhvasamatāsthitasarvakāyavākcittavajras tathāgataḥ sarvatathāgatādhyuṣitapraśastabhūṣite mahāmaṇiratnapratyupte vicitravarṇaghaṇṭāvasaktamārutoddhūtapaṭtapatākāsragdāmacāmarahārārdhahāracandropaśobhite sarvakāmadhātūpariparanirmitavaśavartino devarājasya bhavane vijahāra ||
T02adhsatpu:12: AśP 3. evaṃ pramukhābhir aṣṭābhir bodhisattvakoṭībhiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto
T02adhsatpu:14: ādau kalyāṇaṃ madhye kalyāṇaṃ paryavasāne kalyāṇaṃ svarthaṃ suvyañjanam kevalaṃ paripūrṇaṃ pariśuddhaṃ paryavadātaṃ sarvadharmaviśuddhimukhaṃ brahmacaryam saṃprakāśayati sma ||
T02adhsatpu:15: AśP 4. yad uta sarvadharmasvabhāvaviśuddhimukhaṃ nama prajñāpāramitānayaṃ deśayati sma |
T02adhsatpu:16: tadyathā (1) surataviśuddhipadam etad yat uta bodhisattvapadam |
T02adhsatpu:37: tathā hi sarvadharmāḥ svabhāvaviśuddhāḥ sarvadharmāsvabhāvatayā prajñāpāramitāviśuddhiteti
T02adhsatpu:38: AśP 5. yaḥ kaścid vajrapāṇe imaṃ sarvadharmasvabhāvaviśuddhipadanirhāranāmadheyaṃ prajñāpāramitānayaṃ sakṛd api śroṣyati tasyā bodhimaṇḍāt sarvajñeyāvaraṇakleśāvaraṇakarmāvaraṇāni
T02adhsatpu:39: mahānty apy upacinvato na kadācid api narakādyapāyopapattir bhaviṣyati |
T02adhsatpu:40: pāpāni ca kṛtamātrāṇy aduḥkhataḥ kṣayaṃ yāsyanti |
T02adhsatpu:41: yaś ca dhārayiṣyati dine dine vācayiṣyati svādhyāyiṣyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati sa ihaiva janmani sarvadharmasamatāvajrasamādhipratilambhāt sarvadharmeśvaro bhaviśyati |
T02adhsatpu:43: ṣoḍaśame mahābodhisattvajanmani tathāgatatvaṃ pratilapsyate vajradharatvaṃ ceti ||
T02adhsatpu:44: AśP 6. atha bhagavān sarvatathāgatamahāyānābhisamayaḥ sarvamaṇḍalaḥ sakalavajradhātvagryasattvaḥ
T02adhsatpu:45: aśeṣānavaśeṣasattvadhātuvinayanasamarthaḥ sarvārthasiddhaḥ sarvavajrapāṇir mahāsamayo 'nekavajramahāguhyasattvaparivāra imam eva prajñāpāramitānayārtham udyotayan prahasitavadanas tad ādyaṃ mahāvajram
T02adhsatpu:46: vāmagarvollālanatayā svahṛdyutkarṣaṇayogena dhārayann idam mahāsukhavajrāmoghasamayaṃ nāma
T02adhsatpu:48: AśP 7. atha bhagavān vairocanas tathāgataḥ punar apīmaṃ
T02adhsatpu:54: AśP 8. yaḥ kaścid vajrapāṇe imāṃś caturo dharmavihārāñ śroṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati bhāvayiṣyati sa sarvapāpasamācāro 'pi
T02adhsatpu:57: AśP 9. athedam uktvā bhagavāñ jñānamuṣṭiparigraha idam evārthapadaṃ
T02adhsatpu:58: bhūyasyā mātrayoddīpayan smitamukha idaṃ sarvadharmasamatāhṛdayam abhāṣata
T02adhsatpu:60: AśP 10. atha bhagavān sarvaduṣṭavinayanaśākyamunis tathāgataḥ punar api
T02adhsatpu:66: AśP 11. yaḥ kaścid vajrapāṇe imaṃ prajñāpāramitānayaṃ śroṣyati
T02adhsatpu:67: dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati bhāvayiṣyati tasya traidhātukopapannān api sarvasattvān prapātayato nāpāyagamanaṃ bhaviṣyati vinayavaśam upādāya |
T02adhsatpu:69: AśP 12. atha vajrapāṇir imam eva dharmatārthaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayoddīpayaṃs trilokavijayavajrāṃ nāma mudrāṃ baddhvā sabhrukuṭibhrūbhaṅgadīptadṛṣṭivihasitaruṣiteṣaddaṃṣṭrākarālavadanakamalaḥ pratyālīḍhasthānastha idaṃ vajrahūṃkāraṃ nāma hṛdayam abhāṣata |
T02adhsatpu:71: AśP 13. atha bhagavān svabhāvaviśuddhadharmatāprāptas tathāgataḥ punar apīmaṃ sarvadharmasamatāvalokiteśvarajñānamudraṃ
T02adhsatpu:77: AśP 14. yaḥ kaścid vajrapāṇe imaṃ nayaṃ śroṣyati dhārayisyati vācayiṣyati bhāvayiṣyati sa sarvarāgamadhyasthito 'pi padmam iva rāgadoṣair na malair āgantukair lepaṃ yāsyati |
T02adhsatpu:79: AśP 15. atha bhagavān avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattva imam
T02adhsatpu:80: evārthapadaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayoddīpayan prahasitavadanaḥ padmapattravikāsanatayā rāgādinirlepatām avalokayann idaṃ sarvajagadviśvarūpapadmaṃ nāma hṛdayam abhāṣata |
T02adhsatpu:82: AśP 16. atha bhagavān sarvatraidhātukādhipatis tathāgataḥ punar api
T02adhsatpu:88: AśP 17. athākāśagarbho bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prahasitavadano bhūtvā svaśirasi vajraratnābhiṣekamālām avabandhayann imam eva dharmatārthaṃ
T02adhsatpu:89: bhūyasyā mātrayoddīpayann idaṃ sarvābhiṣekasamayaratnaṃ nāma hṛdayam abhāṣata |
T02adhsatpu:92: sarvatathāgatamuṣṭidharaḥ sarvatathāgataḥ śāśvataḥ punar apīmaṃ sarvatathāgatajñānamudrādhiṣṭhānavajraṃ nāma prajñāparamitānayārtham abhāṣata |
T02adhsatpu:97: AśP 19. yaḥ kaścid vajrapāṇe imam dharmaparyāyaṃ śroṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyaty uddeksyati bhāvayiṣyati sa sarvasiddhīḥ sarvasaṃpattīḥ sarvajñānāni sarvakāryāṇi sarvakāyavākcittavajratvasarvottamasiddhiṃ ca pratilapsyate |
T02adhsatpu:99: AśP 20. atha bhagavān vajramuṣṭir mahāsamayavajramudrāparigraha imam evārthaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayoddīpayan prahasitavadana idaṃ sarvadṛḍhavajramudrāsiddhisamayaṃ nāma hṛdayam abhāṣata aḥ ||
T02adhsatpu:100: AśP 21. atha bhagavān sarvadharmasamatāprapañcas tathāgataḥ punar apīmaṃ
T02adhsatpu:106: AśP 22-31 missing AśP 32. ...t* tatra mahāvajreśvara idaṃ tattvahṛdayam agāt* |
T02adhsatpu:109: 'paryantāniṣṭhadharmā punar apy asya kalpasya pariniṣṭhādhiṣṭhānārtham imaṃ sarvadharmasamatāpariniṣṭhādhiṣṭhānavajraṃ
T02adhsatpu:115: AśP 33*. vajra oṃ sarvadharmatāprapañco hili sarvadharmatā mili
T02adhsatpu:117: AśP 34. yaḥ kaścid vajrapāṇe imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śroṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyaty uddekṣyati pravartayiṣyati bhāvayiṣyati tasyāniṣṭhāṃ
T02adhsatpu:118: buddhabodhisattvacaryāṃ gatvā sarvāvaraṇapariniṣṭhatayā tathāgatatvaṃ vajradharatvaṃ vāśu bhaviṣyati ||
T02adhsatpu:120: oṃ bhagavann ārāt pāraṃ viśodhaya svāhā || oṃkārapūrvaṅgamād oghottāraṇaṃ kariṣyāmi
T02adhsatpu:122: AśP 35. atha sarvatathāgatāḥ samājam āgamyāsya dharmaparyāyasyāmogham apratihatāśusiddhyarthaṃ vajrapāṇaye sādhukāram adāt*
T02adhsatpu:123: sādhu sādhu mahāsattva sādhu sādhu mahāsukha |
T02adhsatpu:124: sādhu sādhu mahāyāna sādhu sādhu mahāmate || 1||
T02adhsatpu:128: adhṛṣṭāś cāghatavyāś ca sarvamārādibhis tu te || 3 ||
T02adhsatpu:131: idam uktvā tu sarvāgrāḥ sarvabuddhāḥ sasauraghanāḥ |
T02adhsatpu:133: AśP 37. atha bhagavān vairocanas tathāgataḥ sarvatathāgataguhyadharmatāprāptaḥ sarvadharmāprapañcaḥ punar apīdaṃ mahāsukhavajrāmoghasamayaṃ nāmāmoghavajradharmasamatāprajñāpāramitānayamukhaṃ paramādyam
T02adhsatpu:139: sakalatraidhātukaiśvaryottamasiddhir mahābodhisattvānām aśeṣānavaśeṣasattvadhātuviśodhanādhyavasāyahetvarthenety āsaṃsārādhyavasāyināṃ mahāvīryāṇāṃ mahāsattvānām aśeṣānavaśeṣasattvadhātuparitrāṇasarvahitasukhottamasiddhyai saṃvartate ||
T02adhsatpu:149: tāvat sattvārtham atulaṃ śaktāḥ kartum anirvṛtāḥ || 6 ||
T02adhsatpu:152: rāgādivinayo loka ā bhavāt pāpakṛt sadā |
T02adhsatpu:153: teṣāṃ viśodhanārthaṃ tu vinayanty ā bhavāt svayam || 8 ||
T02adhsatpu:154: yathā padmaṃ suraktaṃ tu rāgadoṣair na lipyate |
T02adhsatpu:155: vāsadoṣair bhave nityaṃ na lipyante jagaddhitāḥ || 9 ||
T02adhsatpu:159: AśP 39. yaḥ kaścid vajrapāṇe imaṃ paramādyam prajñāpāramitānayamukhaṃ
T02adhsatpu:160: dharmaparyāyaṃ dine dine kālyam utthāyoccārayiṣyati śroṣyati vā sa sarvasukhasaumanasyalābhī mahāsukhavajrāmoghasamayasiddhim ātyantikīm ihaiva janmani lapsyate |
T02adhsatpu:162: AśP 40. atha bhagavān vajrapāṇiṃ guhyakādhipatim āmantrayate sma |
T02adhsatpu:164: oṃ bodhicittavajre || 1 || oṃ samantabhadracarye || 2 || oṃ cintāmaṇi || 3 ||
T02adhsatpu:165: oṃ anirodhe || 4 || oṃ jātivivartani || 5 || oṃ sarvavijñāne || 6 || oṃ mahāvirāgadharmate || 7 || oṃ vīryakavace || 8 || oṃ sarvagāmini || 9 ||
T02adhsatpu:166: oṃ vajrakavacadṛḍhacitte || 10 || oṃ sarvatathāgate || 11 || oṃ svabhāvaviśuddhe || 12 || oṃ dharmatājñānaviśuddhe || 13 || oṃ karmaviśodhani hūṃ || 14 || oṃ nisumbhavajriṇi phaṭ* || 15 || oṃ kāmarāge || 16 || oṃ jaha vajre || 17 || oṃ hūṃ sarvadāyini || 18 || oṃ hrīḥ || oṃ akāramukhe || 20 || oṃ prajñāpāramite || 21 || oṃ aṃ vaṃ hūṃ oṃ aḥ
T02adhsatpu:169: AśP 42. nāyaṃ vajrapāṇe 'navaropitakuśalamūlānāṃ sattvānāṃ karṇapuṭe nipatiṣyati |
T02adhsatpu:170: nāpy anavaropitakuśalamūlaiḥ sattvaiḥ śakyo likhituṃ paṭhituṃ dhārayituṃ vācayituṃ satkartuṃ gurukartuṃ mānayituṃ pūjayitum* |
T02adhsatpu:171: anyatra bahubuddhāvaropitakuśalamūlās te sattvā bhaviṣyanti ya imaṃ prajñāpāramitānayamukham dharmaparyāyam antaśa ekākṣaram api śroṣyanti |
T02adhsatpu:174: 'śītigaṅgānadīvālukāsamāni buddhakoṭiniyutaśatasahasrāṇi na satkṛtāni na gurukṛtāni na mānitāni na pūjitāni bhavanti tena na śakyo 'ayaṃ
T02adhsatpu:176: tasmāc caityabhūtaḥ pṛthivīpradeśo bhaviṣyati yatrāyaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ pracariṣyati |
T02adhsatpu:177: vandanīyaś ca sa pudgalo bahukalpakoṭī bhaviṣyati yasyāyaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ kāyagato vā pustakagato vā bhaviṣyati |
T02adhsatpu:179: na cāsya māraḥ pāpīyān antarāyaṃ kariṣyati |
T02adhsatpu:180: catvāraś cāsya mahārājānaḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddhā bhaviṣyanti rakṣāvaraṇaguptaye anyāś ca devatāḥ |
T02adhsatpu:183: samāsato yatra buddhakṣetre ākāṅkṣiṣyate tatra tatropapatsyate |
T02adhsatpu:185: api ca pradeśamātraṃ mayā kīrtitam iti ||
T02adhsatpu:187: āttamanaso vajrapāṇipramukhā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sā ca sarvāvatī parṣat sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaś ca loko bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* ||
